If the number of slain civilians is more than twice the number of rescued civilians, each investigator suffers 1 additional mental trauma. — If it is a tie, nothing happens.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator loses all of their clues. The lead investigator must decide (choose one): — Discard the Ally asset in play with the highest printed cost. Test ά (X), where X is that asset's printed cost. If you fail, place charges on The Shade Reaper equal to the discarded asset's printed cost. — Place 1 doom on Tzu San Niang. If it is act 1, advance the act (to act 1b).

property.name: Text
property.value: If there is only one investigator in the game, this agenda gets +1 doom threshold. Forced – When you engage Tzu San Niang: Investigators at your location must spend 1π clues, as a group. If they cannot, draw the top card of the encounter deck instead. (Hint: When this agenda advances, Tzu San Niang will harvest a nearby spirit if her location is unknown!)

property.name: Text
property.value: If Tzu San Niang is in play at any location: Tzu San Niang attacks each investigator at her location. Return her to the shadows and resolve her concealed keyword, distributing each of those concealed mini-cards as evenly as possible among each location with a non-weakness Geist enemy. Flip this card back to agenda 2a. ——— If Tzu San Niang is in the shadows: Reveal all concealed mini-cards in play and set each decoy aside, out of play. Swap the Tzu San Niang enemy with her concealed mini-card. Place each non-weakness Geist enemy at her location facedown beneath her, then place 4 charges on The Shade Reaper. If there are no non-weakness Geist enemies in play, advance the act to act 2b. Otherwise, return Tzu San Niang to the shadows and resolve her concealed keyword, distributing each of those concealed mini-cards as evenly as possible among each location with a non-weakness Geist enemy. Flip this card back to agenda 2a.

property.name: Text

property.value: Objective – Find Tzu San Niang before the agenda advances. When you engage Tzu San Niang, investigators must spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance. If they cannot, return her to the shadows and resolve her concealed keyword.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put the set-aside Melati's Shop location into play and reveal it. Disengage each investigator from each enemy engaged with them and move each investigator to Melati's Shop. Read Scenario Interlude: The Bomoh (page 47).

property.name: Text
property.value: Geist enemies cannot leave Haunted locations. Objective – Quell the restless spirits before they are consumed by Tzu San Niang! At the end of the round, if there are no non-weakess Geist enemies in play, advance.

property.name: Text

Flip Tzu San Niang to her (Out For Blood) side and spawn her at the location where her mini-card was. Advance the agenda directly to agenda 3a (do not resolve agenda 2b). ——— If there is at least 1 enemy facedown beneath Tzu San Niang: The lead investigator exposes all concealed mini-cards. Flip Tzu San Niang to her (Out For Blood) side and spawn her at the location where her mini-card was. Advance the agenda directly to agenda 3a (do not resolve agenda 2b).

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator who has not resigned is driven insane, and is never seen or heard from again. All memory of their existence is purged from reality. If any investigators resigned, those investigators may immediately advance to act 3b.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective – Find the heart of the Outsiders' domain. When the Outsiders' Lair is revealed, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn the set-aside Mimetic Nemesis enemy at Outsiders' Lair, exhausted. Each investigator chooses 2 non-weakness cards in their discard pile and sets them aside, out of play, as hollows. Find the set-aside The Red Gloved Man story asset and place him with the other set-aside hollows, as a hollow. He is considered to be owned by all of the investigators. If he is the bearer of any keys, do not attach those keys to him.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Red-Gloved Man cannot be discarded or drawn. η If Mimetic Nemeis is at your location, spend 1 clue: Deal 2 damage to it. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity from Mimetic Nemesis. Objective – When The Red-Gloved Man enters play, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Outsider enemy loses aloof. Forced – If The Red-Gloved Man is defeated: Remove him from the game. Objective – Time to get the hell out of here! If each surviving investigator has resigned, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Check which Conspirator assets are in the victory display. — If both The Red-Gloved Man and Aliki Zoni Uperetria are in the victory display, proceed to (-->R1) (page 57). — If The Red-Gloved Man is in the victory display, proceed to (-->R2) (page 58). — If Aliki Zoni Uperetria is in the victory display, proceed to (-->R3) (page 58). — If neither The Red-Gloved Man nor Aliki Zoni Uperetria are in the victory display, proceed to (-->R4) (page 58).

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Resign. Test ά or ί (4). If you succeed, you resign, adding each Conspirator asset you control to the victory display. If you fail, you remain trapped here, and this test gets –1 difficulty until the end of your turn.

Hunter. 1 fight, 1 health, 1 evade, 1 damage value. If Golem is defeated, set it aside, out of play, as a hollow."

II): Place 4 doom on agenda 2a. Advance the act. ——— If the current act is Secrets and Lies (v. III): Flip 1π keys from their Stable side to their Unstable side. Immediately resolve an additional enemy phase (then resume with the current phase).

Each investigator takes 2 damage and 2 horror but may either (choose one, or neither): — Shift an Unstable key they control without flipping it to its Stable side to cancel all of the damage and horror just dealt to them by the above effect. — Flip any number of Stable keys they control to their Unstable side to cancel that much damage/horror just dealt to them by the above effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Red-Gloved Man gains concealed 1π and cannot be damaged. Objective – At the end of the round, if each investigator is at the same location as The Red-Gloved Man, they may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove each location from the game. (Investigators are not defeated during this process. Other enemies and attachments at those locations are discarded, and concealed mini-cards are set aside.) Put The Knotted Tower, Gravity-Defying Climb, and the Towering Vertex locations into play in a straight vertical line, with The Towering Vertex at the top and The Knotted Tower at the bottom. Take the top 3 locations in the Otherworld deck and place them in the shadows, arranged in a line from left to right. Take the 3 City of Remnants mini-cards, shuffle them facedown, and arrange them around The Knotted Tower as follows: One to its left, one to its right, and one below. Place each investigator at The Knotted Tower and The Red-Gloved Man enemy at the Towering Vertex. Remove the encounter deck and encounter discard pile from the game, replacing them with the second encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do not draw cards from the encounter deck during the mythos phase. Objective – Prepare for your journey into the Outside, and proceed when you are ready. At the end of any round, if each investigator is at the same location, they may advance. The sooner, the better. (Hint—You will also be forced to advance automatically when the agenda advances.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove agenda 1a from the game, moving all of its doom to agenda 2a. Remove each location from the game. (Investigators are not defeated during this process. Other enemies and attachments at those locations are discarded, and concealed mini-cards are set aside.) Put The Knotted Tower, Gravity-Defying Climb, and the Towering Vertex locations into play in a straight vertical line, with The Towering Vertex at the top and The Knotted Tower at the bottom. Take the top 3 locations in the Otherworld deck and place them in the shadows, arranged in a line from left to right. Take the 3 City of Remnants mini-cards and X decoys, where X is the amount of doom on agenda 2a, shuffle them facedown, and arrange them as evenly as possible around The Knotted Tower to its left, right, and below. Place each investigator at The Knotted Tower and The Red-Gloved Man enemy at the Towering Vertex. Shuffle each other set-aside Coterie enemy into the encounter deck. (Note: From now on, draw cards from the encounter deck during each mythos phase, as normal.)

property.name: Text

Place each investigator at The Knotted Tower and The Red-Gloved Man enemy at the Towering Vertex.

In order for an investigator to enter The Towering Vertex, concealed mini-cards around Gravity-Defying Climb must be exposed in the following sequence: First, City of Remnants (L); second, City of Remnants (M); third, City of Remnants (R).

property.value: Revelation – If there are no enemies in the shadows, Undercover gains surge. Otherwise, test έ or ί (4). If you fail, place a decoy at the location with the most concealed mini-cards, flip it facedown, and shuffle each concealed mini-cards at that location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put Seeing Shadows into play in your threat area. Forced – After you fail a skill test while at a location with a concealed mini-card: Take 1 horror. ηη: Discard Seeing Shadows.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Revelation – If there are no enemies in the shadows, Figures in the Dark gains surge. Otherwise, you must decide (choose one): — Each enemy in the shadows attacks you. — Each investigator loses an action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Concealed 1. Forced – After you expose an enemy in the shadows not named Coterie Enforcer, if Coterie Enforcer is in the shadows: It attacks you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Concealed 1. Forced – After you expose an enemy in the shadows not named Coterie Enforcer, if Coterie Enforcer is in the shadows: It attacks you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Concealed 1. Forced – At the end of the enemy phase, if Coterie Assassin is in the shadows: It attacks each investigator at each location with 1 or more concealed mini-cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Concealed 1. Forced – At the end of the enemy phase, if Coterie Assassin is in the shadows: It attacks each investigator at each location with 1 or more concealed mini-cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – If there are no Coterie enemies in play, Swift Retreat gains surge. Otherwise, find the nearest Coterie and test ί (3). If you fail, that enemy attacks you. If you fail and that enemy is not in the shadows, resolve its concealed keyword (if able).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – If there are no Coterie enemies in play, Bound in Red gains surge. Otherwise, attach it to the Coterie enemy with the highest printed health. Attached enemy gets +1 fight, +1 evade, +1 damage and +1 horror. η: Flip a Stable key you control to its Unstable side. Then, discard Bound in Red. An investigator at any location may trigger this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Surge. Revelation – Each Coterie enemy shifts each key attached to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Forced – When Paracausal Entity engages you: Look at the top card of your deck. If it is not a weakness, set it aside, out of play, as a hollow.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When Apocalyptic Presage enters play: Each investgator chooses a non-weakness card they control in their hand or play area and sets it aside, out of play, as a hollow. ι When Apocalyptic Presage is defeated: Instead of adding it to the victory display, discard it and choose up to 3 set-aside hollows. Add them to their onwer's hands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – For each set-aside hollow you own, if there are 1 or more copies of that hollow in your play area and/or hand, discard those copies and take 1 damage and 1 horror. If no cards are discarded by this effect, choose a non-weakness card you control in your hand or play area and set it aside, out of play, as a hollow.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Hunter. Forced – If Otherworldly Mimic is ready, when an investigator at its location plays, commits, or triggers an ability on a copy of a set-aside hollow: It attacks that investigator.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put Memory Variant into play next to the agenda deck. Forced – After an event is played: Instead of discarding it, set it aside, out of play, as a hollow. η: Test ά (4). If you succeed, discard Memroy Variant. Any investigator may trigger this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ά (3). For each point you fail by, choose a non-weakness card in your hand, set it aside, out of play, as a hollow. If you succeed by 2 or more, you may take 1 horror to choose a set-aside hollow and add it to its onwer's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Hunter. Forced – After you end your turn at Paradigm Effacer's location: Look at the top card of your deck. If it is not a weakness, set it aside, out of play, as a hollow. Then, if you own 3 or more set-aside hollows, Paradigm Effacer attacks you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Attach to an Outsider enemy without a copy of Matter Inversion attached. If you cannot, Matter Inversion gains surge. Attached enemy loses aloof, gains retaliate, and gets +1 fight and +1 evade. Forced – After attached enemy is successfully evaded: Discard Matter Inversion and draw 1 of your set-aside hollows.

property.name: Text
property.value: Concealed 2. Hunter. Massive. Forced – After you discover a clue at your location with 1 or more concealed mini-cards, if Emissary from Yuggoth is in the shadows: It attacks you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put Tenebrous Eclipse into play next to the agenda deck. No more than 1 concealed mini-card can be exposed by each investigator each round. Forced – At the end of the round: Discard 1 copy of Tenebrous Eclipse from play. (Max once per round).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Attach Splintered Space to your location and test ί (3). If you fail, take 1 damage for each Hex treachery attached to your location. After this test ends, if there are exactly 3 copies of Splintered Space in play, discard them.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Attach Beyond the Pale to your location and test ά (3). If you fail, take 1 horror for each Hex treachery attached to your location. After this test ends, if there are exactly 3 copies of Beyond the Pale in play, discard them.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Attach to your location. Forced – After you end your turn at attached location: Choose a non-weakness card in your hand and set it aside, out of play, as a hollow. ηη: Discard Warped Reality.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Place 1 doom on an asset you control with the highest printed resource cost. If no doom was placed by this effect, Touch of the Beyond gains surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put Compulsion into play in your threat area. Forced – When your turn begins: Reveal a random chaos token from the chaos bag. If it is a α, β, γ, or δ token, the first action you perform during this turn must be the below ability, if able. ηη: Discard Compulsion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put Distorted Reasoning into play in your threat area. You cannot perform the same type of action twice in a row. (Types include activate, engage, evade, fight, investigate, move, play, resource, and draw.) Forced – At the end of your turn: Test ά (3). If you succeed, discard Distorted Reasoning.

property.name: Text
property.value: Concealed 1. Forced – When you expose this location: — If it is in the left position in the shadows, take 1 damage. — If it is in the right position in the shadows, take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Increase the difficulty to fight or evade each concealed mini-card at Rambling Route by 2. η Spend X resources: Choose a concealed mini-card adjacent to a locaiton X connections away. Look at its revealed side (without exposing it). (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Concealed 1. Forced – When you expose this location: — If it is in the left position in the shadows, lose 2 resources. — If it is in the middle position in the shadows, lose 1 action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Increase the difficulty to fight or evade each concealed mini-card at Rambling Route by 2. η Spend X resources: Choose a concealed mini-card adjacent to a locaiton X connections away. Look at its revealed side (without exposing it). (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Concealed 1. Forced – When you expose this location: — If it is in the middle position in the shadows, choose a non-weakness card in your hand and set it aside, out of play, as a hollow. — If it is in the right position in the shadows, set an asset you control aside, out of play, as a hollow.

property.name: Text
property.value: Increase the difficulty to fight or evade each concealed mini-card at Rambling Route by 2. η Spend X resources: Choose a concealed mini-card adjacent to a locaiton X connections away. Look at its revealed side (without exposing it). (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Concealed 1. Forced – When you expose this location: — If it is in the left position in the shadows, take 1 damage. — If it is in the right position in the shadows, take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When you move from Alien Frontier to a connecting location to its left or right, test ί (5). If you fail, take 2 damage. η Take 1 horror: Look at the revealed side of either a location in the shadows, or the top card of the Otherworld deck. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Concealed 1. Forced – When you expose this location: — If it is in the left position in the shadows, lose 2 resources. — If it is in the middle position in the shadows, lose 1 action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When you move from Alien Frontier to a connecting location above or below it, test ί (5). If you fail, take 2 damage. η Take 1 horror: Look at the revealed side of either a location in the shadows, or the top card of the Otherworld deck. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Concealed 1. Forced – When you expose this location: — If it is in the left position in the shadows, lose 2 resources. — If it is in the middle position in the shadows, lose 1 action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After you reveal Weald of Effigies: Look at the top card of your deck. If it is not a weakness, set it aside, out of play, as a hollow. θ If there are no clues on Weald of Effigies: Either swap the position of 2 concealed mini-cards adjacent to locations, or swap the positions of 2 locations in the shadows. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Concealed 1. Forced – When you expose this location: — If it is in the middle position in the shadows, choose a non-weakness card in your hand and set it aside, out of play, as a hollow. — If it is in the right position in the shadows, set an asset you control aside, out of play, as a hollow.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After you reveal Weald of Effigies: Look at the top card of your deck. If it is not a weakness, set it aside, out of play, as a hollow. θ If there are no clues on Weald of Effigies: Either swap the position of 2 concealed mini-cards adjacent to locations, or swap the positions of 2 locations in the shadows. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Concealed 1. Forced – When you expose this location: — If it is in the left position in the shadows, take 1 damage. — If it is in the middle position in the shadows, choose a non-weakness card in your hand and set it aside, out of play, as a hollow. — If it is in the right position in the shadows, take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After you reveal Cliffs of Insanity: Move each concealed mini-card adjacent to it so they are arranged as evenly as possible in empty spots adjacent to locations not named Cliffs of Insanity.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Revelation – You must decide (choose one): — Flip each decoy over. Shuffle all concealed mini-cards in play, then place them facedown at random in the positions they were in. — Each investigator takes 1 damage and 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Retaliate. Forced – After you flip a key from its Unstable side to its Stable side: The Red-Gloved Man attacks you. Then, the Red-Gloved Man shifts each of his attached keys.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Spawn – Location farthest from you. Forced – At the end of the enemy phase, if La Chica Roja is unengaged: Move 1 resource from each investigator to her. She shifts each of her attached keys. ι After La Chica Roja is defeated: Distribute her resources among the investigators, as you wish.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: He Sees What Is Not There

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Forced – When you defeat The Sanguine Watcher: He shifts each of his attached keys twice.

card.name: The Beast in a Cowl of Crimson

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Spawn – Location farthest from you. Forced – After you fail a skill test while at The Beast in a Cowl of Crimson's location, if it is ready: It shifts each of its attached keys.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn – Location farthest from you. Each other Coterie enemy gets +2 fight. Forced – After another Coterie enemy is discarded from play: The Claret Knight shifts each of his attached keys.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Forced – After Thorne enters play: They shifts each of their attached keys. θ Choose a key attached to your investigator and remove it from the game: Add Thorne to the victory display. Thorne is now the bearer of the chosen key. (Update the Campaign Log.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Patrol (nearest location with at least one other Coterie enemy). Forced – When another Coterie enemy at Desiderio Delgado Álvarez's location would take 1 or more damage: Deal that damage to him, instead. Then, he shifts each of his attached keys.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Forced – When Amaranth attacks: She shifts each of her attached keys. If damage and/or horror from this attack is assigned to an asset, defeat that asset.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Retaliate. Forced – When you succeed at a skill test by 2 or more while fighting or attempting to evade Tzu San Niang: She shifts each of her attached keys.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Forced – At the end of the enemy phase: Each investigator looks at the top card of their deck. Set each non-weakness card looked at in this way aside, out of play, as a hollow. If there is already a copy of that card set aside as a hollow, Aliki Zoni Uperetria shifts each of her attached keys.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι When you expose a decoy, exhaust Inspector Flint: Cancel the exposing of that decoy, flip it facedown and either draw 1 card or choose a different concealed mini-card at that location to expose.

property.name: Text
property.value: While there is a concealed mini-card at your location, you get +1 έ, +1 ή, and +1 ί. ι After you expose a card in the shadows, exhaust Agent Ari Quinn: Draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: You get +1 ά. θ Exhaust Dr. Dewi Irawan: Either reveal a card from your hand to shuffle each copy of that card that is set-aside as a hollow into its owner's deck, or discard a card from your hand to shuffle any set-aside hollow into its owner's deck. In either case, gain 1 resource for each card shuffled in this way.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent. While embarking to a new destination on the map, you may exile Expedited Ticket and mark 1 time in your Campaign Log to travel anywhere on the map.

property.name: Text
property.value: Foundation Intel cannot leave your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – You must either (choose one): — Immediately shift an Unstable key you control. — Flip each Stable key you control to its Unstable side.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shift – Deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location, or 1 damage to all enemies at your location. Flip this key to its Unstable side.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shift – Each investigator takes 1 direct damage. Then, if an investigator shifted this key, flip it to its Stable side.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shift – Add 1 ammo, charge, secret, supply or evidence to an asset controlled by an investigator at your location. Flip this key to its Unstable side.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shift – Each investigator loses 3 resources. Then, if an investigator shifted this key, flip it to its Stable side.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shift – Automatically evade all enemies at your location. Flip this key to its Unstable side.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shift – Each investigator takes 1 direct horror. Then, if an investigator shifted this key, flip it to its Stable side.
